```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(AmesHousing)
```

```{r}
ames <- make_ames()
options(scipen = 10)
lm2 <- lm(Sale_Price ~ Gr_Liv_Area + Year_Built, data = ames)
summary(lm2)

```
```{r}
confint(lm2, level = 0.95)
```
